19#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/aec3_common.h"

25namespace webrtc {
26namespace {
27
28size_t FindPeakIndex(rtc::ArrayView<const float> filter_time_domain,
29 size_t peak_index_in,
30 size_t start_sample,
31 size_t end_sample) {
32 size_t peak_index_out = peak_index_in;
33 float max_h2 =
34 filter_time_domain[peak_index_out] * filter_time_domain[peak_index_out];
35 for (size_t k = start_sample; k <= end_sample; ++k) {
36 float tmp = filter_time_domain[k] * filter_time_domain[k];
37 if (tmp > max_h2) {
38 peak_index_out = k;
39 max_h2 = tmp;
40 }
41 }
42
43 return peak_index_out;
44}
45
46} // namespace
47
48int FilterAnalyzer::instance_count_ = 0;
49
50FilterAnalyzer::FilterAnalyzer(const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
51 size_t num_capture_channels)
52 : data_dumper_(
53 new ApmDataDumper(rtc::AtomicOps::Increment(&instance_count_))),
54 bounded_erl_(config.ep_strength.bounded_erl),
55 default_gain_(config.ep_strength.default_gain),
56 h_highpass_(num_capture_channels,
57 std::vector<float>(
58 GetTimeDomainLength(config.filter.refined.length_blocks),
59 0.f)),
60 filter_analysis_states_(num_capture_channels,
61 FilterAnalysisState(config)),
62 filter_delays_blocks_(num_capture_channels, 0) {
63 Reset();
64}
65
66FilterAnalyzer::~FilterAnalyzer() = default;
67
68void FilterAnalyzer::Reset() {
69 blocks_since_reset_ = 0;
70 ResetRegion();
71 for (auto& state : filter_analysis_states_) {
72 state.Reset(default_gain_);
73 }
74 std::fill(filter_delays_blocks_.begin(), filter_delays_blocks_.end(), 0);
75}
76
77void FilterAnalyzer::Update(
78 rtc::ArrayView<const std::vector<float>> filters_time_domain,
79 const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
80 bool* any_filter_consistent,
81 float* max_echo_path_gain) {
82 RTC_DCHECK(any_filter_consistent);
83 RTC_DCHECK(max_echo_path_gain);
84 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(filters_time_domain.size(), filter_analysis_states_.size());
85 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(filters_time_domain.size(), h_highpass_.size());
86
87 ++blocks_since_reset_;
88 SetRegionToAnalyze(filters_time_domain[0].size());
89 AnalyzeRegion(filters_time_domain, render_buffer);
90
91 // Aggregate the results for all capture channels.
92 auto& st_ch0 = filter_analysis_states_[0];
93 *any_filter_consistent = st_ch0.consistent_estimate;
94 *max_echo_path_gain = st_ch0.gain;
95 min_filter_delay_blocks_ = filter_delays_blocks_[0];
96 for (size_t ch = 1; ch < filters_time_domain.size(); ++ch) {
97 auto& st_ch = filter_analysis_states_[ch];
98 *any_filter_consistent =
99 *any_filter_consistent || st_ch.consistent_estimate;
100 *max_echo_path_gain = std::max(*max_echo_path_gain, st_ch.gain);
101 min_filter_delay_blocks_ =
102 std::min(min_filter_delay_blocks_, filter_delays_blocks_[ch]);
103 }
104}
105
106void FilterAnalyzer::AnalyzeRegion(
107 rtc::ArrayView<const std::vector<float>> filters_time_domain,
108 const RenderBuffer& render_buffer) {
109 // Preprocess the filter to avoid issues with low-frequency components in the
110 // filter.
111 PreProcessFilters(filters_time_domain);
112 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_linear_filter_processed_td", h_highpass_[0]);
113
114 constexpr float kOneByBlockSize = 1.f / kBlockSize;
115 for (size_t ch = 0; ch < filters_time_domain.size(); ++ch) {
116 RTC_DCHECK_LT(region_.start_sample_, filters_time_domain[ch].size());
117 RTC_DCHECK_LT(region_.end_sample_, filters_time_domain[ch].size());
118
119 auto& st_ch = filter_analysis_states_[ch];
120 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(h_highpass_[ch].size(), filters_time_domain[ch].size());
121 RTC_DCHECK_GT(h_highpass_[ch].size(), 0);
122 st_ch.peak_index = std::min(st_ch.peak_index, h_highpass_[ch].size() - 1);
123
124 st_ch.peak_index =
125 FindPeakIndex(h_highpass_[ch], st_ch.peak_index, region_.start_sample_,
126 region_.end_sample_);
127 filter_delays_blocks_[ch] = st_ch.peak_index >> kBlockSizeLog2;
128 UpdateFilterGain(h_highpass_[ch], &st_ch);
129 st_ch.filter_length_blocks =
130 filters_time_domain[ch].size() * kOneByBlockSize;
131
132 st_ch.consistent_estimate = st_ch.consistent_filter_detector.Detect(
133 h_highpass_[ch], region_,
134 render_buffer.Block(-filter_delays_blocks_[ch])[0], st_ch.peak_index,
135 filter_delays_blocks_[ch]);
136 }
137}
138
139void FilterAnalyzer::UpdateFilterGain(
140 rtc::ArrayView<const float> filter_time_domain,
141 FilterAnalysisState* st) {
142 bool sufficient_time_to_converge =
143 blocks_since_reset_ > 5 * kNumBlocksPerSecond;
144
145 if (sufficient_time_to_converge && st->consistent_estimate) {
146 st->gain = fabsf(filter_time_domain[st->peak_index]);
147 } else {
148 // TODO(peah): Verify whether this check against a float is ok.
149 if (st->gain) {
150 st->gain = std::max(st->gain, fabsf(filter_time_domain[st->peak_index]));
151 }
152 }
153
154 if (bounded_erl_ && st->gain) {
155 st->gain = std::max(st->gain, 0.01f);
156 }
157}
158
159void FilterAnalyzer::PreProcessFilters(
160 rtc::ArrayView<const std::vector<float>> filters_time_domain) {
161 for (size_t ch = 0; ch < filters_time_domain.size(); ++ch) {
162 RTC_DCHECK_LT(region_.start_sample_, filters_time_domain[ch].size());
163 RTC_DCHECK_LT(region_.end_sample_, filters_time_domain[ch].size());
164
165 RTC_DCHECK_GE(h_highpass_[ch].capacity(), filters_time_domain[ch].size());
166 h_highpass_[ch].resize(filters_time_domain[ch].size());
167 // Minimum phase high-pass filter with cutoff frequency at about 600 Hz.
168 constexpr std::array<float, 3> h = {
169 {0.7929742f, -0.36072128f, -0.47047766f}};
170
171 std::fill(h_highpass_[ch].begin() + region_.start_sample_,
172 h_highpass_[ch].begin() + region_.end_sample_ + 1, 0.f);
173 for (size_t k = std::max(h.size() - 1, region_.start_sample_);
174 k <= region_.end_sample_; ++k) {
175 for (size_t j = 0; j < h.size(); ++j) {
176 h_highpass_[ch][k] += filters_time_domain[ch][k - j] * h[j];
177 }
178 }
179 }
180}
181
182void FilterAnalyzer::ResetRegion() {
183 region_.start_sample_ = 0;
184 region_.end_sample_ = 0;
185}
186
187void FilterAnalyzer::SetRegionToAnalyze(size_t filter_size) {
188 constexpr size_t kNumberBlocksToUpdate = 1;
189 auto& r = region_;
190 r.start_sample_ = r.end_sample_ >= filter_size - 1 ? 0 : r.end_sample_ + 1;
191 r.end_sample_ =
192 std::min(r.start_sample_ + kNumberBlocksToUpdate * kBlockSize - 1,
193 filter_size - 1);
194
195 // Check range.
196 RTC_DCHECK_LT(r.start_sample_, filter_size);
197 RTC_DCHECK_LT(r.end_sample_, filter_size);
198 RTC_DCHECK_LE(r.start_sample_, r.end_sample_);
199}
200
201FilterAnalyzer::ConsistentFilterDetector::ConsistentFilterDetector(
202 const EchoCanceller3Config& config)
203 : active_render_threshold_(config.render_levels.active_render_limit *
204 config.render_levels.active_render_limit *
205 kFftLengthBy2) {
206 Reset();
207}
208
209void FilterAnalyzer::ConsistentFilterDetector::Reset() {
210 significant_peak_ = false;
211 filter_floor_accum_ = 0.f;
212 filter_secondary_peak_ = 0.f;
213 filter_floor_low_limit_ = 0;
214 filter_floor_high_limit_ = 0;
215 consistent_estimate_counter_ = 0;
216 consistent_delay_reference_ = -10;
217}
218
219bool FilterAnalyzer::ConsistentFilterDetector::Detect(
220 rtc::ArrayView<const float> filter_to_analyze,
221 const FilterRegion& region,
222 rtc::ArrayView<const std::vector<float>> x_block,
223 size_t peak_index,
224 int delay_blocks) {
225 if (region.start_sample_ == 0) {
226 filter_floor_accum_ = 0.f;
227 filter_secondary_peak_ = 0.f;
228 filter_floor_low_limit_ = peak_index < 64 ? 0 : peak_index - 64;
229 filter_floor_high_limit_ =
230 peak_index > filter_to_analyze.size() - 129 ? 0 : peak_index + 128;
231 }
232
233 for (size_t k = region.start_sample_;
234 k < std::min(region.end_sample_ + 1, filter_floor_low_limit_); ++k) {
235 float abs_h = fabsf(filter_to_analyze[k]);
236 filter_floor_accum_ += abs_h;
237 filter_secondary_peak_ = std::max(filter_secondary_peak_, abs_h);
238 }
239
240 for (size_t k = std::max(filter_floor_high_limit_, region.start_sample_);
241 k <= region.end_sample_; ++k) {
242 float abs_h = fabsf(filter_to_analyze[k]);
243 filter_floor_accum_ += abs_h;
244 filter_secondary_peak_ = std::max(filter_secondary_peak_, abs_h);
245 }
246
247 if (region.end_sample_ == filter_to_analyze.size() - 1) {
248 float filter_floor = filter_floor_accum_ /
249 (filter_floor_low_limit_ + filter_to_analyze.size() -
250 filter_floor_high_limit_);
251
252 float abs_peak = fabsf(filter_to_analyze[peak_index]);
253 significant_peak_ = abs_peak > 10.f * filter_floor &&
254 abs_peak > 2.f * filter_secondary_peak_;
255 }
256
257 if (significant_peak_) {
258 bool active_render_block = false;
259 for (auto& x_channel : x_block) {
260 const float x_energy = std::inner_product(
261 x_channel.begin(), x_channel.end(), x_channel.begin(), 0.f);
262 if (x_energy > active_render_threshold_) {
263 active_render_block = true;
264 break;
265 }
266 }
267
268 if (consistent_delay_reference_ == delay_blocks) {
269 if (active_render_block) {
270 ++consistent_estimate_counter_;
271 }
272 } else {
273 consistent_estimate_counter_ = 0;
274 consistent_delay_reference_ = delay_blocks;
275 }
276 }
277 return consistent_estimate_counter_ > 1.5f * kNumBlocksPerSecond;
278}
279
280} // namespace webrtc
